prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: HABS Architectural Drawings, Accession 5946-j, Special Collections Department, University of Virginia Library

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These drawings were given to the Manuscripts Division by K. Edward Lay, School of Architecture, University of Virginia, on October 28, 1993.

processinfo.head: Funding Note
processinfo.p: Funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Additional measured architectural drawings of seven historic buildings in Charlottesvilleand Scottsville, Virginia, 58 sheets, 1993 (3 oversize folders), produced for the Historic American Buildings Survey(HABS) by architectural students of the University of Virginia School of Architectureunder the direction of Professor K. Edward Lay.

did.unittitle: Blair (Tipton) House, Harrison Street, Scottsville, Albemarle County, Virginia, by Marita D. Fritzand John M. Lupinos(9 sheets)
Canal Warehouse, Scottsville, Albemarle County, Virginia, by Jamie Barnettand Beth Cates(9 sheets)
Hughes House, 307 Market Street, Charlottesville, Virginia, by Matthew Barnesand Brent Campbell(9 sheets)
Massie-Wills House, University of Virginia, Charlottesville, Virginia, by Peter Eckmanand David Akinaka(5 sheets)
Price-Poore House, 427 Park Street, Charlottesville, Virginia, by Brian Hughesand Denis McNamara(7 sheets)
Vowles Townhouses, 1111-1113 West Main Street, Charlottesville, Virginia, by J. Brian Dillardand Nathaniel Seymour McCormick(10 sheets)
John A.G. Davis House (The Farm), 1201 East Jefferson Street, Charlottesville, Virginia, by Jennifer Patsosand Wayne Nelson(9 sheets)
